titles.title: Narragansett Justice Act
Narragansett Justice Act

To amend the Rhode Island Indian Claims Settlement Act to conform that Act with the judgments of the United States Federal Courts regarding the rights and sovereign status of certain Indian Tribes, including the Narragansett Tribe, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 391.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 105-692.

bill.summary: 6/19/1997--Introduced. Narragansett Justice Act - Amends the Rhode Island Indian Claims Settlement Act to treat the settlement lands of the Narragansett Tribe as Indian lands for the purposes of the Indian Gaming Regulatory Act.
